issue.title: [CF 780] Icon Shown [Hidden Time, Visible Time Conditions]
issue.body:
In one of the recent Alpha versions the when you use either Icon Shown, Icon Hidden Time, or Icon Visible Time you are not able to specifiy which 'Icon to Check'. The drop down menu doesn't even show up.

Reverting to 6.1.5 solves the problem with the 'Icon to check' drop down returning when one of the 3 conditions are selected.


> Posted by CurseForge user Torchler | Imported from CurseForge issue #780 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry. Should be fixed in r760.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
